func.title: GetMeshMaterial

param.name: submesh
param.desc: If the mesh is composed of multiple submeshes then this parameter can be used to specify the submesh whose material to query.

func.desc: Returns the material currently set for the calling object. May also be called from definition context to return the default material of the graphics of this definition.

example.text: If a clonk has its eyes open then this script makes it close them, otherwise they are opened.
Resets the mesh material of all submeshes of this object to their respective defaults.
